channel.title: Client jarring issue?
channel.description: [center]So I tried to jar my client to give it to a friend so we can play on a server i'm hosting, and we both get this same error when the client is in .jar form, I've tried a number of things but to no avail, any ideas?[/center] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Pq7ZwLQ.png[/img]

item.title: Client jarring issue?

item.description:
@Xcaper wrote:

[center]So I tried to jar my client to give it to a friend so we can play on a server i’m hosting,
and we both get this same error when the client is in .jar form,
I’ve tried a number of things but to no avail, any ideas?[/center]
